typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as decimal(20,2),
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		registration_dttm as timestamp,
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		ip_address as string,
		cc as string,
		country as string,
		birthdate as string,
		salary as decimal(20,2),
		title as string,
		comments as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@id == source2@id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
